程序包 org.hibernate.validator.spi.resourceloading

ResourceBundleLocator interface.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    ResourceBundleLocator
    Used by ResourceBundleMessageInterpolator to load resource bundles containing message texts to be displayed in case of validation errors.

程序包org.hibernate.validator.spi.resourceloading的说明

ResourceBundleLocator interface. Several implementations are provided in the package org.hibernate.validator.resourceloading.

This package is part of the public Hibernate Validator API.
